register.missingDataError: account creation: missing data. please make sure that you pass an email, name, password and confirmed password
register.nameValidityError: account creation: name can only contain english letters, digits, underscores or hyphens, and must include at least 4 characters

logs.creationErrorDateExists: log creation: date already exist. existing entries can be edited but not recreated
logs.deleteErrorDateDoesntExist: log deletion: cannot delete log from $1 as it does not exist
logs.updateErrorDocumentNotFound: log update: cannot update log from $1 as it does not exist
logs.updateErrorOther: log update: cannot update log from $1. please make sure your input is valid
logs.deleteErrorZeroDeletionUnknown: log deletion: cannot delete due to unknown reason
